result.title: Question on stringstream's
result.content:
Hello! I've just started using stringstream's but I've encountered a problem. Why does this code print 0 ?

#include<iostream>
#include<sstream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	stringstream ss;
	int i;
	ss<<0;
	ss>>i;
	ss<<1;
	cout<<ss.str()<<endl;
	return 0;
}

Thanks in advance.
